title: PWA Chat
description: A fully functional Progressive Web App messenger built from scratch using only HTML, CSS, and TypeScript — no frameworks.

title: Q-CV
description: A web-based CV management and generation tool developed in collaboration with Quanto Solutions at HS Esslingen.

title: ToDo App
description: A simple web-based Todo app built with Angular and NestJS, tested using Cypress for frontend and k6 for backend performance.

title: Zenith
description: A flexible and customizable PWA for tracking meals, workouts, and mental well-being — designed to adapt to your personal goals and habits.

title: Pride Flags
description: My very first NPM package released. It gives you the Power to embed animated Flags using CSS Gradients.
